mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.business_info_id AS "businessInfoId", a.serial_numbers AS "serialNumbers", a.name AS "name", a.imgs AS "imgs", a.base_price AS "basePrice", a.benefit_price AS "benefitPrice", a.people_limit AS "peopleLimit", a.lesson_count AS "lessonCount", a.sell_count AS "sellCount", a.start_time AS "startTime", a.end_time AS "endTime", a.address AS "address", a.content AS "content", a.lesson_quota AS "lessonQuota", a.quota_num AS "quotaNum", a.recommend AS "recommend", a.state AS "state", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lesson_info( id, business_info_id, serial_numbers, name, imgs, base_price, benefit_price, people_limit, lesson_count, sell_count, start_time, end_time, address, content, lesson_quota, quota_num, recommend, state, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{businessInfoId}, #{serialNumbers}, #{name}, #{imgs}, #{basePrice}, #{benefitPrice}, #{peopleLimit}, #{lessonCount}, #{sellCount}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{address}, #{content}, #{lessonQuota}, #{quotaNum}, #{recommend}, #{state}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE lesson_info SET business_info_id = #{businessInfoId}, serial_numbers = #{serialNumbers}, name = #{name}, imgs = #{imgs}, base_price = #{basePrice}, benefit_price = #{benefitPrice}, people_limit = #{peopleLimit}, lesson_count = #{lessonCount}, sell_count = #{sellCount}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, address = #{address}, content = #{content}, lesson_quota = #{lessonQuota}, quota_num = #{quotaNum}, recommend = #{recommend}, state = #{state}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE Lesson_Info a SET a.People_Limit = a.People_Limit + 1, a.Sell_Count = a.Sell_Count - 1 WHERE a.Del_Flag = '0' AND a.ID = #{lessonInfoId} AND a.Sell_Count >= 1
